effect.short: Has a $effect_chance% chance to paralyze the target.
effect.full: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 100% chance to paralyze the target.

flavorTexts.text:
After obtaining Z-Power, the user, Alolan Raichu,
attacks the target with full force. This move leaves
the target with paralysis.
